item.title: 硅谷一位市长希望从人工智能数据中心的繁荣中分一杯羹
item.description: 一位市长正试图把人工智能数据中心的热潮带回硅谷的后院。但首先...【原文：One mayor is trying to bring some of the AI data center frenzy back to Silicon Valley’s backyard. But first…】

item.title: 瑞士接近达成美国 15%的改进关税协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞士即将获得对美国出口征收 15%关税的优惠，这将使瑞士在 8 月份被美国征收 39%的惩罚性关税后如释重负。【原文：Switzerland is close to securing a 15% tariff on its exports to the US, in what would be a relief for the country after it was hit with a punishing 39% levy in August, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 杜克探索私人信贷，开创公用事业公司的先河
item.description: 杜克能源公司（Duke Energy Corp. ）已就其 870 亿美元资本计划的融资部分与私人信贷提供商进行了洽谈，这在公用事业公司中尚属首次。【原文：Duke Energy Corp. has spoken with private credit providers about financing pieces of its $87 billion capital plan in what would be a first for utilities.】

item.title: Venture Global 首席执行官称将面临多年液化天然气合同仲裁
item.description: 据出口设施开发商 Venture Global Inc. 的负责人称，该公司正准备与客户就其首个液化天然气设施进行长达数年的仲裁。【原文：Venture Global Inc. is bracing for arbitration with customers at its first liquefied natural gas facility to stretch over several years, according to the head of the export facility developer.】

item.title: 据说英国通信供应商 SCG 正在酝酿 8 亿英镑的出售计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，为企业提供电信和云服务的英国供应商 SCG 正在探讨出售事宜，并寻求高达 8 亿英镑（10.5 亿美元）的估值。【原文：SCG, a British provider of telecom and cloud services to companies, is exploring a sale and is seeking a valuation of as much as £800 million ($1.05 billion), according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 白银挤压后伦敦金库出现历史性流入
item.description: 伦敦金库中的白银数量创下了至少九年来的最大增幅，缓解了因白银极度紧俏而导致上海和纽约的白银价格飙升的局面。【原文：Silver held in London vaults swelled by the largest amount in at least nine years, easing an extreme squeeze that sent prices soaring over metal stored in Shanghai and New York.】

item.title: 米莱获胜刺激债券交易，阿根廷首席财务官踊跃入市
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱伊总统在国会中期选举中获胜后，投资者需求旺盛，首席财务官们急于抓住这一机遇，大批阿根廷公司正着手出售全球债券。【原文：A flurry of Argentine companies is moving to sell global bonds as chief financial officers rush to capitalize on strong investor demand following President Javier Milei’s victory in congressional midterm elections.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰表示赞成在 12 月降息半点
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）表示，好于预期的通胀数据和就业市场持续疲软的迹象要求在 12 月份连续第三次降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said better-than-expected inflation data and signs of continued weakness in the job market call for a third consecutive interest-rate cut in December.】

item.title: 欧盟计划简化数据和人工智能规则，以促进商业发展
item.description: 根据欧盟将于 11 月 19 日公布的一揽子计划，欧盟正准备精简其隐私规则，以增强本地技术和人工智能公司的竞争力。【原文：The European Union is preparing to streamline its privacy rulebooks in a bid to bolster the competitiveness of local technology and artificial intelligence companies, according to a package the bloc will unveil on Nov. 19.】

item.title: 德意志银行在债务谈判前挑选顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国光纤网络运营商德国格拉斯法瑟控股有限公司（Deutsche Glasfaser Holding GmbH）的银行贷款人已选择年利达律师事务所（Linklaters LLP）作为法律顾问，该公司正准备就其债务问题进行谈判。【原文：Bank lenders to Deutsche Glasfaser Holding GmbH have picked Linklaters LLP as a legal adviser, according to people familiar with the matter, as the German fiber network operator gears up for talks over its debtload.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳总统重申购买戴比尔斯多数股权的计划
item.description: 博茨瓦纳总统重申，他计划收购戴比尔斯公司的多数股权，因为英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）希望出售其在这家标志性钻石公司的控股权。【原文：Botswana’s president reiterated his plan to acquire a majority stake in De Beers, as Anglo American Plc looks to offload its controlling interest in the iconic diamond company.】

item.title: 古普塔在特拉菲古拉镍矿审判前失去第三批律师
item.description: 贸易巨头特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）追捕的涉嫌欺诈者普尔提克-古普塔（Prateek Gupta）失去了他的第三组商业律师，这使他在即将举行的伦敦审判中的辩护成为疑问。【原文：Prateek Gupta, the alleged fraudster pursued by trading giant Trafigura Group, has lost his third set of commercial lawyers, throwing his defense in an upcoming London trial into doubt.】

item.title: 谷物上涨，因希望美国结束停摆，恢复数据处理
item.description: 芝加哥谷物期货周一上涨，因为人们希望美国可能接近达成妥协，结束有史以来最长的政府关门，恢复农业数据的获取。【原文：Chicago grains futures rose Monday on hopes the US may be nearing a compromise to end the longest government shutdown on record, restoring access to agricultural data.】

item.title: 医疗保险公司股票下滑，补贴延长希望渺茫
item.description: 周一，美国医疗保险公司和医院的股价下跌，因为立法者越来越接近结束美国历史上最长的政府关门，但却没有确保延长《平价医疗法案》（Affordable Care Act）的补贴。【原文：Shares of US health-care insurers and hospitals are falling Monday as lawmakers draw closer to ending the longest government shutdown in US history without securing an extension of Affordable Care Act subsidies.】

item.title: 马姆达尼获胜暴露了纽约民主党人在圣胡安峰会上的混乱局面
item.description: 本周末，佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）在波多黎各圣胡安参加了纽约州立法者和权力掮客的年度聚会，现场气氛热烈。但是，在 Somos el Futuro 会议上的兴奋并不能掩盖他在上周市长选举中的决定性胜利所暴露出的该州民主党内部的裂痕。【原文：The excitement that greeted Zohran Mamdani this weekend at an annual gathering of New York lawmakers and power brokers in San Juan, Puerto Rico was effusive. But that excitement at the Somos el Futuro conference couldn’t mask the fault lines that his decisive win in last week’s mayoral election exposed within the state’s Democratic party.】

item.title: BC Partners 即将完成 SCM 保险交易，组建价值 32.5 亿英镑的集团
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由 BC Partners 控制的英国保险服务公司 Davies Group 即将达成收购加拿大理赔处理和风险解决方案提供商 SCM Insurance Services 的交易。【原文：Davies Group, the UK insurance services firm controlled by BC Partners, is nearing a deal to acquire Canadian claims processing and risk solutions provider SCM Insurance Services, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以色列初创企业获得加沙战争以来罕见的阿联酋投资
item.description: 一家开发实验室培育牛奶的以色列初创公司从阿拉伯联合酋长国的一家基金筹集到 2000 万美元，这是自以色列与哈马斯开战以来，波斯湾地区对以色列的罕见投资。【原文：An Israeli startup developing lab-grown milk raised $20 million from a fund in the United Arab Emirates, marking a rare investment from the Persian Gulf into Israel since the start of its war with Hamas.】

item.title: 民意调查显示，南非支持在预算中实现 3% 的消费物价指数目标
item.description: 据一项调查显示，南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）预计将在本周批准 3% 的通胀目标，从而使财政政策与中央银行推动将物价锚定在这一水平的努力保持一致。【原文：South Africa’s Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana is expected to endorse a 3% inflation target this week, aligning fiscal policy with the central bank’s push to anchor prices at that level, according to a survey.】

item.title: 里夫斯最强烈地暗示了英国的增税计划
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，工党可能准备违背其不加税的竞选承诺，因为她认为英国的预算将是 "困难的"。【原文：Rachel Reeves indicated the Labour Party may be preparing to break its election promises not to raise taxes, as she looks ahead to what she called a “difficult” UK budget.】

item.title: OpenBrand CPI 数据显示美国 10 月消费品通胀放缓
item.description: OpenBrand 价格数据显示，10 月份美国耐用消费品和个人用品通胀率三个月来首次出现减速，反映出商家打折力度略有回升。【原文：US consumer durables and personal goods inflation decelerated in October for the first time in three months, reflecting a slight pickup in the degree of merchant discounting, according to OpenBrand price data.】

item.title: 美联储主席穆萨莱姆认为美国第一季度经济将反弹
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，他预计美国经济将在明年初强劲反弹，这强调了官员们需要谨慎对待进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said he expects the US economy to bounce back strongly early next year, underscoring the need for officials to approach additional interest-rate cuts with caution.】

item.title: 芯片、航空股因关门乐观情绪引领美国股市反弹
item.description: 美国股市周一反弹，投资者对立法者即将达成协议结束史上最长的政府关门表示乐观。【原文：US stocks rallied Monday as investors expressed optimism that lawmakers were nearing a deal to end the longest government shutdown in history.】

item.title: 瑞士为欧盟协议赢得地平线欧洲协议
item.description: 在周一签署了一项协议之后，瑞士将重新加入包括地平线欧洲（Horizon Europe）在内的欧盟相关项目名册，该协议可能会释放来自欧盟的一大波研究资金。【原文：Switzerland will rejoin a roster of European Union-related programs including Horizon Europe after a deal signed on Monday that could unlock a wave of research funding from the bloc.】

item.title: 贝莱德面临私人贷款 100%亏损的危机
item.description: 大约一个月前，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）认为，它向陷入困境的家装公司 Renovo Home Partners 提供的私人债务价值 100 美分。截至上周，该公司有了新的评估：零。【原文：About a month ago, BlackRock Inc. deemed the private debt it had extended to Renovo Home Partners, a struggling home improvement company, to be worth 100 cents on the dollar. As of last week, the firm had a new assessment: zero.】

item.title: 英国超过南非成为津巴布韦第一大汇款来源国
item.description: 据津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）称，英国有望成为今年津巴布韦最大的汇款来源国，首次超过南非。【原文：The UK is expected to be the largest source of remittances to Zimbabwe this year, overtaking South Africa for the first time, according to Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube.】

item.title: 特朗普寻求和平协议，墨丘利评估刚果钶钽铁矿
item.description: 如果特朗普政府能促成和平协议，Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. 公司将与一家美国支持的投资公司商讨在刚果战区开发一个珍贵的钽项目。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. has held discussions with a US-backed investment company about developing a prized tantalum project in a Congolese war zone, if the Trump administration can broker a peace deal.】

item.title: 阿波罗与竞争对手一起收购马德里竞技队
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. has bought a majority stake in Atlético de Madrid, joining a growing number of private equity funds taking control of famous football teams.】

item.title: 萨科齐因卡扎菲阴谋入狱仅 20 天即获释
item.description: 法国前总统尼古拉-萨科齐（Nicolas Sarkozy）因涉嫌参与与利比亚已故领导人卡扎菲（Moammar Qaddafi）政权有关的选举资金阴谋而被判处五年监禁，在服刑仅 20 天后，他将从法国监狱的 "噩梦 "中获释。【原文：Former French President Nicolas Sarkozy will be released from his “nightmare” in a French jail just 20 days into a five-year sentence for his role in an alleged electoral funding conspiracy linked to the late Libyan leader Moammar Qaddafi’s regime.】

item.title: 离岸资产攀升，澳大利亚养老金提高外汇风险敞口
item.description: 澳大利亚的养老金巨头们正在增加货币风险，因为他们的离岸资产超过了所有投资的一半，对多元化的渴望超过了对美元避风港吸引力减弱的担忧。【原文：Australia’s pension giants are adding currency risk as their offshore assets surpass half of all investments, with desire for diversification outweighing fears the US dollar’s haven appeal is waning.】

item.title: 硅谷生物黑客迷恋的护肤品牌
item.description:
遍布 TikTok 的 OneSkin 将美容业对抗衰老的痴迷和科技界对阻止死亡的幻想融为一体。【原文：

OneSkin, all over TikTok, merges the beauty industry’s fixation with antiaging and tech’s fantasy of halting death.

】
